entry.value: select a.EVENT_TYPE from (SELECT ttd.lane_tx_id , ttd.etc_account_id, tvte.EVENT_TYPE FROM fpms.t_transaction_dispute ttd, ibts.t_viol_tx tvt, crm.v_etc_account vea, ibts.t_viol_tx_event tvte WHERE ttd.lane_tx_id (+) = tvt.lane_tx_id and tvte.lane_tx_id =tvt.lane_tx_id AND ttd.lane_tx_id = :LANE_TX_ID AND ttd.etc_account_id = vea.etc_account_id AND vea.account_type_cd = :ACCOUNT_TYPE_CD order by tvte.event_timestamp desc) a where ROWNUM = 1
